dct_title_s: Riparian map of properties and land leases along the Hudson River in Englewood, Palisade and Harrington Townships, New Jersey
dct_description_sm: Map featuring the properties of businesses and privately owned land along the Hudson River, among the three townships of Englewood, Harrington and Palisades. Personal names and some land lease dates are provided.
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
No exact date given; latest date on map is 1885; used as inferred date.
Hand-drawn diagrams indicating where different numbered property sketches fit into various areas of the map.
